rules_text:
When Epitaph Hermit enters, pursue Wonder. [i](Reveal a basic land or Wonder card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand.)[/i]
When Epitaph Hermit dies, put it on the bottom of its owner's library.
flavor_text: [i]The last of a plane, she, and it, are immortalized by the Wonderlands' sympathy.[/i]
